source:
from pymatgen.ext.matproj import MPRester
from pymatgen import Structure
from pymatgen.ext.matproj import MPRester
from pymatgen.analysis.diffraction.xrd import XRDCalculator
import matplotlib.pyplot #as plt

from pymatgen import Lattice, Structure, Molecule
with MPRester("kVModF0coZpRa7Ku") as m:

    # Structure for material id
    structure = m.get_structure_by_material_id("mp-961678")

    # Dos for material id
    dos = m.get_dos_by_material_id("mp-961678")

    # Bandstructure for material id
    bandstructure = m.get_bandstructure_by_material_id("mp-961678")

Lambda = 1.54060   #λ=1.54060 Å
xrd = XRDCalculator(Lambda)
Pattern = xrd.get_pattern(structure,  scaled=True, two_theta_range=(0, 90))
hkl = Pattern.hkls
On s'intéresse donc aux trois premiers pics du diffractogramme.

outputs.name: stdout

-Angle 2Θ : 25.3573588461 °

source:
print("Informations sur les trois premiers pics du diffractogramme, pour un rayonnement incident Cu Kα de longueur d'onde λ = 1.54060 Å.","\n")
print("Premier pic :")
print('-indice hkl :', hkl[0][0]["hkl"], 'de multiplicité', hkl[0][0]["multiplicity"])
print("-Angle 2Θ :", Pattern.x[0],"°")
print("-Intensité du pic :", Pattern.y[0])
print("-distance entre deux plans consécutifs :", Pattern.d_hkls[0])
print(" ")
print("Deuxième pic :")
print('-indice hkl :', hkl[1][0]["hkl"], 'de multiplicité', hkl[1][0]["multiplicity"])
print("-Angle 2Θ :", Pattern.x[1],"°")
print("-Intensité du pic :", Pattern.y[1])
print("-distance entre deux plans consécutifs :", Pattern.d_hkls[1])
print(" ")
print("Troisième pic :")
print('-indice hkl :', hkl[2][0]["hkl"], 'de multiplicité', hkl[2][0]["multiplicity"])
print("-Angle 2Θ :", Pattern.x[2],"°")
print("-Intensité du pic :", Pattern.y[2])
print("-distance entre deux plans consécutifs :", Pattern.d_hkls[2])
